url.title: URL to check
url.description: URL of a web page to be monitored

contentSelector.title: Monitored area selector
contentSelector.description: CSS selector of an area you want to monitor

screenshotSelector.title: Screenshot selector
screenshotSelector.description: CSS selector of a screenshot you want to get

sendNotificationTo.title: Email address
sendNotificationTo.description: Email address where you want to get the notification

sendNotificationText.title: Notification Text
sendNotificationText.description: Optional text to include in the email notification.
sendNotificationText.prefill: Hey there, the content has changed!

informOnError.title: Notify me in case of error
informOnError.description:
In case of the problem with selectors on the page, you will get notification mail 
 with the screenshot of the page attached.

proxy.title: Proxy Configuration
proxy.description: Select a proxy if the target website is blocking your access.
proxy.sectionDescription: Here you can specify further the behaviour of the scraper. However we worked hard to set the best options for you already.

navigationTimeout.title: Navigation Timeout
navigationTimeout.description: How long it should wait, in milliseconds, until the page times out

retryStrategy.title: How to retry
retryStrategy.description: Sometimes the page doesn't load properly or the actor gets blocked so retrying those helps. On the other hand retrying wrong selector doesn't help. The recognition of blocked pages is not perfect (about 80%).

maxRetries.title: Navigation Timeout
maxRetries.description: How long it should wait, in milliseconds, until the page times out
